author: cschomak
body:
![global_pixel_2_final](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6997559/33877772-aa699c3a-df29-11e7-8690-068f0ff014ce.png)
- Implemented a meaningful loop in TrackerGeometryCompare instead of one that either gives an exception or a 'break' at the first iteration
- Implemented comparison plots which show only the pixel (see example with quite large differences)
title: Small updates and fixes for geometry comparison tool
